remarks: A ring homomorphism preserves the divisibility relation.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Oct-2017.)
statement:
rhmdvdsr.x $e |- X = ( Base ` R ) $.
rhmdvdsr.m $e |- .|| = ( ||r ` R ) $.
rhmdvdsr.n $e |- ./ = ( ||r ` S ) $.
rhmdvdsr $p |- ( ( ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) /\ A .|| B ) -> ( F ` A ) ./ ( F ` B ) ) $.
